column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Nazia - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen
column2: and had such nice things to say! And I'm also quite pleased our staff was attentive and helpful. Thank you for your suggestion
column4: we are somewhat beholden to the R&D department of our corporate headquarters; they devise our new recipes that we introduce each month. Hopefully in the future we will have something akin to a seafood-style ramen!
